response.overview: Les Malheurs de Louis Feuillade shows the ravages of time on the film Bout de Zan et le crocodile that Louis Feuillade shot in 1913. By isolating and slowing down the most damaged parts of the film by this pioneer of cinema, GÃ©rard Courant has managed to create an object with abstract forms and, insidiously, to give another life to a leading artistic work.
response.title: Les Malheurs de Louis Feuillade
